properties.name: mailboxId
properties.description: ID of a mailbox where the conversation is being created. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: resolveData
properties.description: By default the response only contain the ID to resource. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: The Help Scout user assigned to the conversation

options.name: assignTo
options.description: The Help Scout user assigned to the conversation

options.name: autoReply
options.description: Whether set to true, an auto reply will be sent as long as there is at least one customer thread in the conversation

options.name: closedAt
options.description: When the conversation was closed, only applicable for imported conversations

options.name: createdAt
options.description: When this conversation was created - ISO 8601 date time

options.name: imported
options.description: Whether set to true, no outgoing emails or notifications will be generated

options.name: tags
options.description: List of tags to be added to the conversation. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: user
options.description: ID of the user who is adding the conversation and threads

values.name: draft
values.description: Whether true, a draft reply is created

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: folder
options.description: Filters conversations from a specific folder ID

options.name: mailbox
options.description: Filters conversations from a specific mailbox

options.name: modifiedSince
options.description: Returns only conversations that were modified after this date

options.name: number
options.description: Looks up conversation by conversation number

options.name: sortField
options.description: Sorts the result by specified field

options.name: tags
options.description: Filter conversation by tags. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: resolveData
properties.description: By default the response only contain the ID to resource. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.

options.name: firstName
options.description: First name of the customer. When defined it must be between 1 and 40 characters.

properties.name: addressUi
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: country
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.description: Filters customers from a specific mailbox

options.name: modifiedSince
options.description: Returns only customers that were modified after this date

options.name: sortField
options.description: Sorts the result by specified field

options.name: firstName
options.description: First name of the customer. When defined it must be between 1 and 40 characters.

properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether a draft reply is created

options.description: Whether a draft reply is created

options.name: imported
options.description: Whether no outgoing emails or notifications will be generated

values.name: property
values.description: Name of the binary properties which contain data which should be added to email as attachment

properties.description: Max number of results to return

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
